flawed_nl_solution:
Susan spent 600/2=<<600/2=300>>300 on clothes
After buying clothes she had 600-300= <<600-300=3000>>3000 dollars left
She spent 3000/2=<<3000/2=1500>>1500 dollars on books
She had 3000-1500=<<3000-1500=1500>>1500 dollars left
#### 1500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
